name: nhrst-smartsync-table
description: A WordPress plugin to fetch data from a remote API, display it via a custom block, and manage it in the admin area.

scripts.dist: composer install --no-dev && npm run test && wp dist-archive .
scripts.build: npm run build:tailwind && cd includes/blocks/table-block && npm run build
scripts.dev: npm run dev:tailwind & cd includes/blocks/table-block && npm run dev
scripts.test: npm run phpcs && npm run lint
